text:
COMMONWEALTH OF PUERTO RICO
DEPARTMENT OF EDUCATION
HATO REY, PUERTO RICO
August 22, 1957
OFFICE OF THE
SECRETARY OF EDUCATION
National Association of Educational
Broadcasters (NAEB)
llf Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Sirs:
Please send us the following pamphlets:
SERIES I:
No. 5 - Quartermaster Training Command Educational
Television Study.
No. 7 - Television in Army Training.
No.10 - Television Versus Classroom for Learning
General Psychology.
No.31 - Teaching Algebra and Physics by Means of
Television.
SERIES V:
No. 1 - Broadcast Services of WOI-AM-FM-TV in a
Sample Week.
Thank you
Program Manager
Station WIPR-TV
LSL: cmd
